titles.title: Restoring Faith in Elections Act
Restoring Faith in Elections Act
Automatic Voter Registration Act of 2025
Verifiable, Orderly, and Timely Election Results Act

To ensure election integrity and security and enhance Americans' access to the ballot box by establishing consistent standards and procedures for voter registration and voting in elections for Federal office, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on House Administration, and in addition to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
